item.title: Welcome - First post
item.description: With the plethora of ‘free’ and ‘social’ platforms for microblogging, a need for a personal blog or website seems redundant. I firmly believe in having an independent platform and not relying on ad-promoted giants. A private domain costs a few bucks annually, and hosting a website is easy and quick; can be done on free or paid servers. This static website has zero analytics, ads, or other nonsense. So it should be responsive and fast on desktop or mobile.
item.content:encoded:
With the plethora of ‘free’ and ‘social’ platforms for microblogging, a need for a personal blog or website seems redundant. I firmly believe in having an independent platform and not relying on ad-promoted giants. A private domain costs a few bucks annually, and hosting a website is easy and quick; can be done on free or paid servers.

This static website has zero analytics, ads, or other nonsense. So it should be responsive and fast on desktop or mobile.
